segments.text: Pasadena Traffic School . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to sign up for some classes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What classes did you want to sign up for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to take a driver's course .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'll have to make an appointment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do I need to make an appointment for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You need an appointment so you can sign the papers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , can I make an appointment right now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I make it for tomorrow at 9
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can schedule you for that day and time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks a lot . I'll be there tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
